description:
Be visible from every angle with this bike frame reflector decal kit. The 18 different decals are made to fit all bikes, and they keep you visible at night and in low-light situations. Their thinness (5mils) means they're great at matching curved and uneven surfaces.

  • Rated to last at least 7 years in the harshest conditions
  • Semi-permanent adhesive allows you to remove stickers later if you'd like
  • Can be applied to any frame material, including carbon fibre, aluminum, steel and titanium
  • Made of durable and high-grade vinyl
name: Glint Bike Frame Reflective Sticker Kit
